contents: 1. leaves 1b-15b: Lamaʻāt al-anwār fī al-maqṭūʻ la-hum bi-al-jannah wa-al-maqṭūʻ la-hum bi-al-nār.
2. leaves 15b-59a: Khamrat al-ḥān wa-rannat al-alḥān fī sharḥ Risālat al-Shaykh Arslān.
3. leaves 59b-70a: al-Kawkab al-mutalaʼliʼ sharḥ qaṣīdat al-Ghazzālī.
4. leaves 70b-86a: Nafkhat al-ṣūr wa-nafḥat al-zuhūr fī al-kalām ʻalá abyāt Qabḍat al-nūr.
5. leaves 86b-92b: Kawkab al-ṣubḥ fī izālat layl al-qubḥ.
6. leaves 93a-124b: Miftāḥ al-futūḥ fī mishkāt al-jism wa-zajājat al-nafs wa-miṣbāḥ al-rūḥ.
8. leaves 127b-128b: Rafʻ al-ishtibāh ʻan ʻalamīyat ism Allāh.
9. leaves 131b-137b: al-Kashf wa-al-bayān fīmā yataʻallaqu bi-al-nisyān.
10. leaves 138b-146b: Anwār al-sulūk fī asrār al-mulūk.
11. leaves 147b-155a: Rafʻ al-rayb ʻan ḥaḍrat al-ghayb.
12. leaves 156b-165b: Kashf al-nūr ʻan aṣḥāb al-qubūr.
13. leaves 166b-168b: al-Qawl al-abyan fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat Abī Madyan.

title.@value: لمعات الانوار في المقطوع لهم بالجنة والمقطوع لهم بالنار.
Lamaʻāt al-anwār fī al-maqṭūʻ la-hum bi-al-jannah wa-al-maqṭūʻ la-hum bi-al-nār ... [etc.].
